name: Sheepskin
description:
Sheepskin is a small chunk of a much larger, more realized story game, created in 48 hours for the Cleveland Summer Game Jam. In it, you play as Raff, a young wolf coming to terms with his identity in a society where wolves and sheep have segregated themselves into two distinct factions.

Controls: WASD to move (or a gamepad's left stick) and L to advance text

The Team:

  • Jill Sanders - Art, Animation, and Writing
  • Kyle Thompson - Programming and Design
  • Kevin Thompson - Music and Additional Design

Tools Used:

  • Aesprite
  • OpenTK (C# wrapper for OpenGL) with a custom game engine
  • Sibelius 6
